text:
Vicky the Ice Cream Van is visiting us today,
so we can learn what makes her special.

Hello Vicky, thanks for coming to visit us
today!

Let’s go inside the garage and put Vicky
on the turntable so we can take a closer look
at her

Let's all see what we can learn, as we make
Vicky turn
Giant Ice Cream Cone.

Vicky has a giant plastic ice cream cone on
her roof so that customers can spot her from
the other end of the beach.
Ice Cream Freezer.

Vicky has a special freezer that can cool
down the liquid ice cream really quickly so
that it’s ready to serve.
Musical Chime

When Vicky is driving around, she plays a
tune to let customers know she is on her way.
Serving Hatch

This is closed while Vicky is driving around, but
when she stops, the hatch opens so that she
can serve ice cream to her customers
Ice Cream Machine.

Most ice cream vans have a person inside to
make and serve the ice creams, but behind

her hatch, Vicky has a special robot ice cream
machine that serves delicious ice creams to
her customers.
Lolly Freezer.

For those who don’t like Ice Cream or can’t
eat Dairy, Vicky has another freezer, packed
with all sorts of colourful lollies!
They look yummy!
Children Crossing Sign.

Vicky has a special sign on the back that
says “Children Crossing!

This warns other vehicles to be extra careful
and to watch out
for children in the road.

You must never run into the road - always
make sure that you parent or grown up holds

your hand and helps you to get to 
the Ice Cream Van Safely
Thanks to Vicky for helping us out today
I hope you enjoyed finding out about what makes an Ice Cream Van Special
